poem:
Title: "A Cinematic Atom Scene"

With celluloid atom-splitting,
Nolan's lens in roles rebutting,
Oppenheimer unfolds in flickering light.
Cillian's stare shatters the cold night.

No Barbenheimer or flower moon killer,
Only a man, a science tiller.
In the shrapnel of applause and glamour,
Lies truth dissected by actor's hammer.

On Oscar's eve, poles apart,
An atomic silence makes its start.
